file.name: issue7325-use-delegate-reactive-tags-kotlin.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.1"
info:
  title: test
  version: "1.0"

paths:

  /api/v1/test/{id}:
    get:
      tags: [Test v1]
      operationId: test1
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK

  /api/v2/test:
    get:
      tags: [Test v2]
      operationId: test2
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: string

Error: parse: paths: /api/v1/test/{id}: get: test1: parameters: parse parameter "id": path parameters must be required
